When downloading Windows 7 Ultimate, how do I know which version to download? x86 or x64? Does it make a difference? 

Thanks

@ gismoney,
x86 or 32bit and x64 are based on the processor you are using. You should check if your processor can support x64bit Operating System, if not then you have to download the x86 which is the same as 32bit.
For all those who are asking, this is not yet activated.
